text:
Hello Guy's, I'm new in hubpsot. I wanted to know if it was possible to create a module for the landing page or that it's possible only for website page.
Thank you in advance for your feedback. :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey Kara, modules work in both as long as you specify that the module can work in those page types. Other options include blog templates and emails.
Hello Mark, thank you for your feedback :+1:

Hey everyone, I am relatively new to HubSpot and am encountering an issue trying to create default content in a dnd module. Attached are two screenshots - one of my markup and one of the page in the editor. I am wanting the editor to show the default text and image that I am specifying in my markup but it is not showing up.
